a.title: Go to Warrensburg Jr/Sr High School

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: Standard Work Day and Reporting Resolution
a.span: Standard Work Day and Reporting Resolution

li.a: Standard Work Day and Reporting Resolution

br.span: Effective March 23, 2020 - the buildings are closed to the public.

p.span: Please call us at (518) 623-2861 if you are an essential worker and need assistance with childcare.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 13.5pt; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(31, 73, 125);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Dear Parents, Guardians and Community Members,

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px;

p.span: As I am sure you have heard, Governor Cuomo has extended the school closure through May 15, 2020. This means that if the closure is not extended, we will return to school on May 18th. The buildings will remain closed to the public. If you need something in the buildings, please call 518-623-2861 and we will make arrangements with you.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px;

p.span: I know how hard this has been for all of our families. I want to personally thank the students, families and staff for coming together as a community to continue to provide for our children. If you have any questions about your child’s school work, please reach out to the teachers or the principals. In addition, our psychologist, social workers, and school counselors are available if you need their assistance.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px;

p.span: I want to also give a shout out to everyone helping with our meal distribution. Things have been going smoothly and we will continue our Friday meals during the closure. On a related note, I would like to thank Irving Tissue of Fort Edward for donating 30 cases of frozen french fries from one of their subsidiaries to help our families.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px;

p.span: Once again I want to thank you for your cooperation during this difficult time. Please stay safe.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: On behalf of the entire WCSD team,

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.style: margin: 0px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center;
margin: 0px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center;
p.span: Warren County is putting technology into place that will allow the streaming of regular Health & Safety Briefings to the general public. Please visit our main page (https://www.warrencountyny.gov/) and click the button that says “Click here to sign up for COVID-19 Updates.”

span.span: If you are having difficulty or technical issues with the Chromebook you have been issued, please contact us.

span.br:
If you have Elementary students, please email Mr. Caruso at carusot@wcsd.org
If you have High School students, please email Mr. Fisher at fisherl@wcsd.org

span.span: uring this crisis, all schools in the WSWHE BOCES are working together, with their local county providers and existing licensed daycare providers to find open placements for families of essential health care workers, first responders and other workers deemed essential by the State of New York. The district will coordinate with these families to find available local county placements and existing licensed daycare providers where there are openings. If you have a need, please complete this form.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; text-decoration-line: underline; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

strong.style: text-align: center; font-family: "Bookman Old Style", serif; font-size: 13.3333px; font-style: italic;
strong.span: "We educate, nurture, and empower students within a safe and supportive environment to become respectful and successful citizens of the global community."
